name: The Pharaoh's Tomb
storyline: You discover the entrance to an ancient Pharaoh's tomb, blocked by a rock. If you are skilful, you can get in and take all the treasures - bur beware! The Pharaohs did not build their tombs without making quite sure that their possessions were properly guarded.
summary:
Illustrated text adventure game for the ZX Spectrum. 
 
Play as a grave robber trying to enter the Pharaohs tomb and getting to their well guarded treasure.
